elements.name: appName
elements.label: Virtual Machine name
elements.toolTip: Choose a name for virtual machine where Storage Resource Monitor (SRM) will be deployed.

constraints.validationMessage: Azure resource names cannot contain special characters /"'[]:|<>+=;,?*@& or begin with '_' or end with '.' or '-'. Maximum length 15 characters.

elements.name: virtualMachineSize
elements.label: Virtual Machine size
elements.toolTip: The size of virtual machine to provision for the application.

elements.name: osDiskType
elements.label: OS Disk type
elements.toolTip: You can choose between Azure managed disks types to support your workload or scenario. Learn more about managed disk types.

elements.name: image
elements.label: Image
elements.toolTip: The OS version of virtual machine to provision for the VM.

elements.name: adminUserName
elements.label: Windows Admin Username

constraints.validationMessage: Username cannot end with '.'. Maximum length - 20 characters. Disallowed values: 'admin', 'user', 'user1', 'test', 'user2', 'test1', 'user3', 'admin1', '1', '123', 'a', 'actuser', 'adm', 'admin2', 'aspnet', 'backup', 'console', 'david', 'guest', 'john', 'owner', 'root', 'server', 'sql', 'support', 'support_388945a0', 'sys', 'test2', 'test3', 'user4', 'user5'.

elements.toolTip: Provide admin username for the virtual machine. Maximum length 20 characters.

constraints.customValidationMessage: The password must contain at least 8 characters

toolTip.password: Provide admin password for the virtual machine

options.text: Save up to 49% with a license you already own using Azure Hybrid Benefit.

elements.name: windowsLicenseType
elements.label: Already have a Windows license?
elements.toolTip: If you own Windows licenses with active Software Assurance (SA) or have an active Windows Server subscription, use Azure Hybrid Benefit to save compute cost.

label.publicIpAddress: Public IP address for the VM
label.domainNameLabel: DNS Prefix for the public IP address

toolTip.publicIpAddress: Public IP address for the VM.
toolTip.domainNameLabel: DNS Prefix for the public IP address must be globally unique. The Orion Web Console will be accessible via https://[dnsname]:8787/Orion

elements.name: productChoice
elements.label: Products to install
elements.toolTip: Add other complementary and tightly integrated Orion Platform products to enable more monitoring and management capabilities.
elements.defaultDescription: Please select which SolarWinds Orion products you would like to install

allowedValues.label: Storage Resource Monitor
allowedValues.description: Multi-vendor storage array performance, capacity, and hardware status monitoring

allowedValues.label: Server & Application Monitor
allowedValues.description: SolarWinds Server & Application Monitor (SAM) monitors your applications and their supporting infrastructure, whether they run on-premises, in the cloud, or in a hybrid environment. Automatically discover your dependencies, identify slow applications, and pinpoint root cause issues.

allowedValues.label: Virtualization Manager
allowedValues.description: Manage virtual infrastructure, optimize performance, fix issues, and control resource sprawl

allowedValues.label: Server Configuration Monitor
allowedValues.description: Detect, alert, and track configuration changes to servers, applications, and databases - including who made the change, what changed, and if it affected performance.

allowedValues.label: Web Performance Monitor
allowedValues.description: Comprehensive website and web application performance monitoring from an end-user perspective

allowedValues.label: Network Performance Monitor
allowedValues.description: Multi-vendor network monitoring software designed to reduce network outages and improve performance

allowedValues.label: NetFlow Traffic Analyzer
allowedValues.description: Multi-vendor network flow (NetFlow, sFlow, J-Flow, IPFIX, etc.) traffic analyzer and bandwidth monitoring software

allowedValues.label: Network Configuration Manager
allowedValues.description: Automate multi-vendor network configuration management and compliance

allowedValues.label: IP Address Manager
allowedValues.description: Track and manage IP addresses and DNS and DHCP resources, helping you save time and prevent errors

allowedValues.label: Log Analyzer
allowedValues.description: Collect and analyze event log data to gain insight into the performance of your IT infrastructure

allowedValues.label: User Device Tracker
allowedValues.description: Network device tracking software that can locate users and devices on your network and manage their connectivity

allowedValues.label: VoIP & Network Quality Manager
allowedValues.description: VoIP monitoring software designed for deep critical call QoS metrics and WAN performance insights

allowedValues.label: Engineer's Toolset
allowedValues.description: SolarWinds® Engineer’s Toolset (ETS) helps you monitor and troubleshoot your network with the most trusted tools in network management.

options.text: Additional products may also be installed at a later time directly through the Orion Web Console.

elements.name: appUserPassword
elements.toolTip: Create password for "Admin" user to access the Orion Web Console.

constraints.validationMessage: Orion 'Admin' password must be at least 8 characters in length. It may contain letters, numbers and most of special characters (except of double quote '"'). Maximum length 50 characters.

elements.name: ScalabilityEngine
elements.label: Support scalability Engine
elements.toolTip: Checking "Yes", TCP inbound ports 1801, 5671, and 17777 are enabled

options.text: If "Yes" is selected, TCP ports 1801, 5671, and 17777 will be opened on Virtual Machine to support Scalablity / Poller Engine

elements.name: useAzureSql
elements.label: Installation Type
elements.toolTip: Select Installation Type

options.text:
Orion will create a 'Standard S3' tier Azure SQL database (or databases if Network Traffic Analyzer or Log Analyzer is being installed) 
which is recommended for most evaluations.
Upgrading the Azure SQL database tier may be done at any time through the Microsoft Azure Portal and does not require any changes to Orion.
Existing Azure SQL DB or SQL Server connection information:

elements.name: dbServerName
elements.label: DB Server Name (FQDN)
elements.toolTip: Provide a Fully Qualified SQL Server name. This must be an existing SQL Server.

constraints.validationMessage: The SQL Server Name must be between 3 and 79 characters long and contain letters, numbers and hyphens only alongwith FQDN (e.g [your_server_name].database.windows.net). The SQL server should be an existing server.

elements.name: databaseName
elements.label: Database Name
elements.toolTip: Provide Orion database name.

constraints.validationMessage: The Database Name should be maximum 128 characters long and should not contain reserved words (like master, model, tempdb, etc.) and double quote characters: '"'

elements.name: dbUserName
elements.label: DB Server Admin Username
elements.toolTip: Provide database server admin username.

constraints.validationMessage: Make sure your login name meets the following requirements - It's a SQL Identifier, and not a typical system name (like admin, administrator, sa, root, dbmanager, loginmanager, etc.), or a built-in database user or role (like dbo, guest, public, etc.). Make sure your name doesn't contain whitespaces, unicode characters, or nonalphabetic characters, and that it doesn't begin with numbers or symbols.

elements.name: dbPassword
elements.toolTip: Provide database server admin password.

constraints.validationMessage: Your password must be at least 8 characters in length. Your password must contain characters from three of the following categories: English uppercase letters, English lowercase letters, numbers (0-9), and non-alphanumeric characters (!, $, #, %, etc.) except of single and double quote characters: ''' and '"'

options.text: Existing Azure SQL DB or SQL Server connection information:

elements.name: ntaServerName
elements.label: NTA DB Server Name (FQDN)
elements.toolTip: Provide a Fully Qualified SQL server name. This must be an existing SQL server.

constraints.validationMessage: The SQL Server Name must be between 3 and 79 characters long and contain letters, numbers and hyphens only alongwith FQDN (e.g [your_server_name].database.windows.net). The SQL server should be an existing server.

elements.toolTip: Provide NetFlow Traffic Analyzer (NTA) database name.

constraints.validationMessage: The Database Name should be maximum 128 characters long and should not contain reserved words (like master, model, tempdb, etc.) and double quote characters: '"'

constraints.validationMessage: Make sure your login name meets the following requirements - It's a SQL Identifier, and not a typical system name (like admin, administrator, sa, root, dbmanager, loginmanager, etc.), or a built-in database user or role (like dbo, guest, public, etc.). Make sure your name doesn't contain whitespaces, unicode characters, or nonalphabetic characters, and that it doesn't begin with numbers or symbols.

elements.toolTip: Provide NetFlow Traffic Analyzer (NTA) server admin password.

constraints.validationMessage: Your password must be at least 8 characters in length. Your password must contain characters from three of the following categories: English uppercase letters, English lowercase letters, numbers (0-9), and non-alphanumeric characters (!, $, #, %, etc.) except of single and double quote characters: ''' and '"'
